sys_openapi_operation.name: Update OAuth Client Thumbnail
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation: {"fName":"Update OAuth Client Thumbnail","fOperationId":"setClientThumbnail","fDescription":"Upload a thumbnail for a client you own.
